title: Synthesis and toxicity of monothiooxalamides against human red blood cells, brine shrimp (Artemia salina), and fruit fly (Drosophila melanogaster)
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): María M. Romero-Chávez, Carlos Eduardo Macías-Hernández, Angel Ramos-Organillo, Edgar Iván Jiménez-Ruiz, Marcela Robles-Machuca, Victor Manuel Ocaño-Higuera, María Teresa Sumaya-Martínez
